title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #81
body:
## Date and Time

March 29, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/)â€Š
  - [Announcing the Kiln Merge Testnet](https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/03/14/kiln-merge-testnet/)
- [Shanghai specs](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md), [Tracker](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/projects/1)

### 2. Events & hackathon
- [ETHWMN Fellowship](https://ethwmn.devfolio.co/) February 7 - April 3, 2022
- Devconnect [Schedule](https://devconnect.org/schedule) Amsterdam, Netherlands 18-25 April 2022
  - [OG council](https://www.ogcouncil.com/)
  - [Amsterdam:OG Council](https://medium.com/ethereum-magicians/join-our-upcoming-event-in-amsterdam-og-council-aa8355709557)

### 3. ECH updates
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - Need Ruby dev
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- Cat blazers 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
   - ECH Medium to Mirror 
   - ECH ENS names Ref: [Comment](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/268#issuecomment-1039942553)
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH New Joiners Meeting April 2022
   - [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
   - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 

  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 134](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/AllCoreDevs-Meetings/Meeting%20134.md)
  - Consensus meeting notes 84
  - EIP Improvement Process [meeting 52](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/pull/123)
  - EIP editors apprentice meetings [14 recording](https://youtu.be/FU6FXir-GMY); Meeting 15 planned on Tuesday, Apr 04, 2022, [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/119)

### 4. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting 80

 Anything else?

#### The date for the next meeting - April 12, 2022.
